search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MoonClerk (moonclerk.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for MoonClerk's pricing page is: [https://www.moonclerk.com/pricing](https://www.moonclerk.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

#### You’ll also pay Stripe’s processing fees

MoonClerk partners with payment processor Stripe to help you accept payments immediately & securely.

[View Stripe's Per-Transaction Fees](https://stripe.com/pricing)

###### Extensions

Turbocharge MoonClerk with optional extensions.
===============================================

Upload any content type, add streaming video, and add live webinars. ### $18/mo ###### Learn More](https://www.moonclerk.com/digital-delivery)

[![Image 37](blob:http://localhost/2cd91bdb2be049bd0a160c848a5fccaa) ![Image 38](blob:http://localhost/8ea34c5ce81aee7cc278ed7dbf7a4c6f)![Image 39: Crowdfunding](https://www.datocms-assets.com/31749/1599771447-crowdfunding.png?auto=compress&dpr=0.34&fm=webp%2C%20png&q=90&w=480) ###### Crowdfunding ### Run crowdfunding campaigns Run unlimited crowdfunding campaigns. Set goal amounts and end-dates, publish your campaigns, and publicly track your progress. ### Free ###### Learn More](https://www.moonclerk.com/crowdfunding)

[![Image 41](blob:http://localhost/2cd91bdb2be049bd0a160c848a5fccaa) ![Image 42](blob:http://localhost/fcc7c349fd02387c945848ea50f32dc7)![Image 43: MoonClerk Pro for Mailchimp](https://www.datocms-assets.com/31749/1603552992-mailchimp.png?auto=compress&dpr=0.34&fm=webp%2C%20png&q=90&w=480) ###### MoonClerk Pro for Mailchimp ### Run a paid newsletter We auto-send and auto-sync payer name, email address, recurring plan status, and much more to Mailchimp. ### $18/mo ###### Learn More](https://www.moonclerk.com/moonclerk-pro-for-mailchimp)

Frequently Asked Questions
==========================

Need more help?  
Check out our [Help Center.](http://help.moonclerk.com/)

#### What is Stripe and why do I need it?

Stripe is the payment processor MoonClerk uses to process all payments. Stripe is one of the world’s most secure, innovative, largest, and fastest-growing online payment processors. By using Stripe, you won’t need to work with a separate merchant account, gateway, or other piece of the payments puzzle.

#### Does MoonClerk charge its own transaction fees?

No. Stripe charges a per-transaction fee – it’s between you and Stripe. MoonClerk doesn’t charge any per-transaction fees. We only charge our monthly fee.

#### Is MoonClerk available in my country?

MoonClerk is available anywhere Stripe is available. To find out your Stripe transaction fees, visit their pricing page and choose your country in the bottom left corner of the page.

#### Are transaction fees lower for ACH payments?

Yes. For US-based accounts, you can choose to accept payments directly from bank accounts with ACH. Stripe charges a much lower, capped fee for payments made via ACH, making these payments a great option for large volume transactions.

#### Are there contracts or setup fees?

With MoonClerk and Stripe there are no contracts or setup fees. You can cancel your account anytime. Our fees adjust automatically and we auto-bill your card every month.

#### When does the monthly fee start?

Our monthly fee starts only when you’re ready to accept live payments. Until then, you can create and design payment forms, embed them on your site, customize notifications, etc.

#### Is there a minimum monthly fee?

Once you have activated your account, we do charge our minimum rate of $18 per month, regardless of whether you have transaction volume in a given billing period.

### Ready to get started?  
Sign up now and explore for free!
